text: Mary Brooks (better known as Ann Little; born February 7, 1891 â€“ died May 21, 1984) was an American actress. She acted mostly in Westerns. She acted mostly in silent movies. Besides Westerns, she acted in some comedies and dramas. She retired from performing in movies while still popular in 1932. Brooks was born in California. She died in Los Angeles at ninety-three. title: Ann Little
